structure.unit: Sec. 8-2202. - REPLACEMENT OF REUSE WATER SERVICE STUBS.

law.catch_line: REPLACEMENT OF REUSE WATER SERVICE STUBS.
law.text: In the event of the paving or widening of streets, or the raising or lowering of the grade of a street, or in the installation of curbs or gutters and/or sidewalks, or in the case of the installation of new reuse water lines initiated by the public, all reuse water service stubs may be replaced so as to meet the standards prescribed by the City plumbing code. There shall be no charge for such replacements. (Ord. No. 2006-100, ยง1, 9-19-06)
